channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Pat Green Shares ‘Deeply Personal Loss’ of Multiple Family Members in Texas Floods
item.description: Sending love and light to @PATGREENMUSIC for sharing his heart during this tough time 💔🙏 Let's support each other through music's healing power 🎶 #PatGreen #TexasStrong

item.title: Royel Otis Announce 2025 Arena Shows Across Australia
item.description: 🎉🎶 Pack your bags, mates! Royel Otis is bringing the groove Down Under in 2025! Who's up for an Aussie adventure? 🇦🇺 #RoyelOtisWorldTour

item.title: Annahstasia Shares New “Be Kind” Video Ahead of European Tour: Watch
item.description: 🎥 Let's dance with @annahstasia's new "Be Kind" video! Who's excited for her European tour? 💃 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Former Champ Announce Debut Album i saw you in paradise: Hear Two Songs
item.description: 🌟 Exciting news alert! Former Champ drops debut album ‘i saw you in paradise’ with two killer tracks! 🎶🔥 #NewMusic #FormerChamp

item.title: Blood Orange Announces Headlining Fall Tour
item.description: 🍊🎶 Get ready to dance all night! Blood Orange is hitting the road for a fall tour! Who's joining the groove? 🙌 #BloodOrangeTour
